price: 63. Boye ozali kornona te, ya soló Allah akitisaka mayi kowuta o likolo mpe akomisi mabele (lolenge) ya mayi ya pondu?(1) Ya solo, Allah azali malamu mpe moyebi ya bansango.
arabic: أَلَمۡ تَرَ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ أَنزَلَ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءٗ فَتُصۡبِحُ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ مُخۡضَرَّةًۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَطِيفٌ خَبِيرٞ
footnotes: 1 Mayi ya pondu: Elakisi: Bobimi ya bilona sima ya bokiti ya mbula.

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: alam tara anna al-laha anzala mina al-samāi māan fatuṣ'biḥu al-arḍu mukh'ḍarratan inna al-laha laṭīfun khabīrun
